infoTextForCook: Impacts in fishing are dependent on fuel  consumption per catch.  Fuel consumption  is in turn dependent  on fishing method (e.g. gillnet  fishing or trawling), technology (e.g. vessel and engine) and fish abundance.  These factors may vary signifi-cantly in different regions.  As fish abundance is highly variable in time, different results might be  found for other time periods or years.
name: Wolfsbarsch
